email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Daniel,

I hope you're doing well. We have the vessel SEA HORIZON (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 290m) available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The cargo size is 150,000MT on CIF terms. Our starting freight quote is USD 25.50 per metric ton. Laycan is 25-30 Oct. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for the quote. USD 25.50 seems a bit high given the current market rates. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
Daniel Harris
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Daniel,

Thank you for your response. Considering your volume, I can offer a revised rate of USD 24.75 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

USD 24.75 is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the laycan is flexible. Can we adjust it to 27 Oct - 1 Nov?

Best,
Daniel Harris
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Daniel,

Yes, we can adjust the laycan to 27 Oct - 1 Nov. Please confirm if this works for you, and I will proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Confirmed. Please proceed with the booking and send over the charter party for review.

Best,
Daniel Harris
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Daniel,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Brokers
